Class CustomerSimulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • CustomerSimulation

  • public class CustomerSimulation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts like a restaurant, receiving new customers periodically, putting Customers in a queue and then removing them.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) RandomRange arrival 
      (package private) LineQueue<Customer> customerQueue 
      (package private) RandomRange departure 
      int nextGroupArrivalTime 
      int nextGroupDepartTime 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CustomerSimulation()
      This constructor method instantiates the the LineQueue customerQueue, and creates two random number generators arrival and departure.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkArrival(int arrivalTime, int time)
      This method checks to see if there has been a new group that has arrived.
      void checkDeparture(int departTime, int time)
      This method checks to see if there has been a group that has left.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      void openTil(int closingTime)
      This method essentially runs the simulation for a given amount of time.

        public int nextGroupArrivalTime

        public int nextGroupDepartTime

    • Constructor Detail

      • CustomerSimulation

        public CustomerSimulation()
        This constructor method instantiates the the LineQueue customerQueue, and creates two random number generators arrival and departure. These are used to control when customers enter and leave the restaurant.

    • Method Detail

      • openTil

        public void openTil(int closingTime)
        This method essentially runs the simulation for a given amount of time. Controling when new customers arrive and when current customers leave.
        Parameters:
        closingTime - The closing time for the restaurant, restaurant opens at time = 0.

      • checkArrival

        public boolean checkArrival(int arrivalTime,
                            int time)
        This method checks to see if there has been a new group that has arrived.
        Parameters:
        arrivalTime - The next customer arrival time.
        time - The current time.
        Returns:
        boolean A boolean representing whether or not a group has arrived at this time. (useful for the classes printLine variable, nothing more than aesthetics though)

      • checkDeparture

        public void checkDeparture(int departTime,
                           int time)
        This method checks to see if there has been a group that has left.
        Parameters:
        departTime - The time for the next customer to leave.
        time - The current time.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
